List of all members.

Detailed Description

The int core.fps attribute.

This attribute is in read only mode. The IntAttribute::getValueText() is overrided to provides the print of the GameEngine fps value with the call of show core

int RainbruRPG::Exception::ObjectAttribute::count (  )  [virtual, inherited]

Count the available commands for this attribute.

Returns:
1 if the attribute is in read-only mode, otherwise returns 2.

const char * RainbruRPG::Exception::ObjectAttribute::getAccessText (  )  [inherited]

Get the access mode in text format.

Returns:
[ro] if the attribute is in read-only mode, otherwise return [rw] (read and write mode).

Implements RainbruRPG::Exception::ObjectAttribute.

const char * RainbruRPG::Exception::FpsAttribute::getValueText (  )  [virtual]

Get the actual Frame Per Second value.

This value is given by the GameEngine's IrrlichtDriver and convert to a char* by the StringConv singleton

Reimplemented from RainbruRPG::Exception::IntAttribute.

bool RainbruRPG::Exception::IntAttribute::setValueText ( const char *   )  [virtual, inherited]

Set the value of the attribute.

This function is used by the console to set the value. According to the type of the child the implementation will be different. The function must return if the set is correct.

Returns:
true if the affectation is correct otherwise false.
